changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE appointment ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), archived integer, created_by character varying(255) , date timestamp without time zone, date_created timestamp without time zone, date_modified timestamp without time zone, detail jsonb NOT NULL, modified_by character varying(255) , organisation_unit_id bigint, patient_id bigint, visit_id bigint, CONSTRAINT appointment_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE form ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), name character varying , code character varying , program_code character varying , resource_object jsonb, resource_path character varying , version character varying , usage_status integer, date_created timestamp without time zone, created_by character varying , date_modified timestamp without time zone, modified_by character varying , archived integer, form_precedence jsonb, type integer, main_code character varying , parent_code character varying(255) , CONSTRAINT form_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id))

changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE form_data ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), data jsonb, encounter_id bigint, organisation_unit_id bigint, CONSTRAINT form_data_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE organisation_unit ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), name character varying(100) , description character varying(300) , organisation_unit_level_id bigint, parent_organisation_unit_id bigint, archived integer, details jsonb, date_created timestamp without time zone, created_by character varying , date_modified timestamp without time zone, modified_by character varying , CONSTRAINT organisation_unit_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE patient( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), patient_number character varying , details jsonb, uuid character varying , organisation_unit_id bigint, date_created timestamp without time zone, created_by character varying , date_modified timestamp without time zone, modified_by character varying , archived integer, CONSTRAINT patient_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id))

changeSet.author: Chukwuemeka Ilozue
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE report_info ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), archived integer, description character varying(255) , name character varying(255) , program_code character varying(255) , template character varying , resource_object jsonb, date_created timestamp without time zone, created_by character varying , date_modified timestamp without time zone, modified_by character varying , code character varying , CONSTRAINT report_info_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) )
